text: Sonnie Hale (1 May 1902 - 9 June 1959) was an English theatre and cinema actor and director. He was born in London. His play The French Mistress premiered at Wimbledon Theatre in 1955. He died on 9 June 1959 in London from myelofibrosis, aged 57. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1902 births Category:1959 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English theatre directors Category:Movie directors from London Category:Screenwriters from London Category:Deaths from myelofibrosis
title: Sonnie Hale
